name: Matrix
description: Send alerts to a Matrix room via the Matrix API.

USE_MATRIX.help: Enable sending alerts to a Matrix room.
USE_MATRIX.label: Use Matrix

MATRIX_BASE_URL.help: Base URL of the Matrix server (e.g., https://matrix.org).
MATRIX_BASE_URL.label: Matrix Base URL

MATRIX_ROOM_ID.help: Room ID of the Matrix room to send notifications to.
MATRIX_ROOM_ID.label: Matrix Room ID

MATRIX_ACCESS_TOKEN.help: Access token to authenticate with the Matrix server.
MATRIX_ACCESS_TOKEN.label: Matrix Access Token

MATRIX_ANONYMIZE_IP.help: Mask the IP address in notifications.
MATRIX_ANONYMIZE_IP.label: Anonymize IP
